title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaboration-Based Real-Time Educational Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Core instructional design concepts and intermediate-level comprehension of science subject matter
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three prototypes for science education design using collaborative digital tools.
Learners can improve educational design plans at least twice through real-time peer feedback.
Learners can complete team projects while reorganizing workflows in an analog-digital hybrid environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
